mapper.sql: id, name, type, url, permission, parent_id, sort, external, available, icon, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select t1.id, t1.name, t1.type, t1.url, t1.permission, t1.parent_id, t1.sort, t1.external, t1.available, t1.icon FROM sys_resources t1 INNER JOIN sys_role_resources t2 ON t1.id=t2.resources_id WHERE t2.role_id=#{id}
AND t1.available=1

select t1.id, t1.name, t1.type, t1.url, t1.permission, t1.parent_id, t1.sort, t1.external, t1.available, t1.icon FROM sys_resources t1 INNER JOIN sys_role_resources t2 ON t1.id=t2.resources_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role t3 ON t2.role_id=t3.role_id INNER join sys_role t4 on t4.id=t2.role_id WHERE t1.available=1 and t4.available=1 AND t3.user_id=#{id}
